item.title: Bootcamp Learning Objectives
item.description: Week 1 After week 1, students will have: Learned the basics of HTML by building a website about cats Started the second project of freeCodeCamp’s (New) Responsive Web Design course and be able to continue on their own Learned about the fundamentals of CSS Day 1 After day 1, students will: Receive a computer Create a GitHub account Understand that file and folders can be saved locally1 Understand the basics of HTML Document structure What is a tag?
